error.network: [FR-FR] Network error. Please check your connection.
error.500: [FR-FR] Internal server error. Please try again later.
error.unauthorized: [FR-FR] You are not authorized to perform this action.
error.timeout: [FR-FR] Request timed out. Please try again.
error.form.invalid: [FR-FR] Some fields are invalid. Please review and try again.
error.email.invalid: [FR-FR] The email address is not valid.
error.upload.failed: [FR-FR] File upload failed. Please try again.
error.save.failed: [FR-FR] Could not save your changes. Please try again.
error.delete.failed: [FR-FR] Failed to delete the item. Please try again.
error.tooManyRequests: [FR-FR] Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
error.session.expired: [FR-FR] Your session has expired. Please log in again.
error.validation: [FR-FR] Validation error. Please check your input.
error.notFound: [FR-FR] The requested resource was not found.
